name: David Ramirez
text: Well, it's kind of lame, but you could rent an apartment close to your workplace that you share with other coworkers through working days, then just go home for weekends/ holidays.    If you have enough pull, you could propose to make it a company expense for the use of employees who sign up  =)

source_obj.text: Well, it's kind of lame, but you could rent an apartment close to your workplace that you share with other coworkers through working days, then just go home for weekends/ holidays.
